configuration_guide.value:
========================================
DEPLOYMENT SUCCESSFUL! 
========================================
    
Next Steps:
1. SSH into Nginx server: 
   ssh -i ~/.ssh/id_ed25519 ec2-user@40.172.191.195
       
2. Edit Nginx config: 
   sudo vim /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
       
3. Update backend IPs in 'upstream backend_servers' block:
   - BACKEND_IP_1: 10.0.10.251
   - BACKEND_IP_2: 10.0.10.233
   - BACKEND_IP_3: 10.0.10.189
       
4. Restart Nginx: 
   sudo systemctl restart nginx
       
5. Test: 
   https://40.172.191.195
    
Backend Servers List:
- web-1: Public: 40.172.177.42 | Private: 10.0.10.251
    - web-2: Public: 158.252.72.116 | Private: 10.0.10.233
    - web-3: Public: 3.28.130.61 | Private: 10.0.10.189
    
========================================
